sections.heading: 01|County road improvement definitions
sections.text: Effective:March 12, 2001Latest Legislation:House Bill 549 - 123rd General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A) "Cost" or "costs" includes compensation, damages, and expenses that are incident to an improvement covered by this chapte

sections.heading: 72, inclusive, of the Revised Code relating to improvements wholly within one county shall when applicable apply to improvements authorized by a joint board of county commissioners
sections.text: 72, inclusive, of the Revised Code relating to improvements wholly within one county shall when applicable apply to improvements authorized by a joint board of county commissioners.

sections.heading: 49, inclusive, of the Revised Code apply to the proportion of the compensation, damages, and expenses of any improvement to be paid by any county or township if such improvement is authorized and constructed by any joint board of county commissioners, or by agreement entered into between such joint
sections.text: 49, inclusive, of the Revised Code apply to the proportion of the compensation, damages, and expenses of any improvement to be paid by any county or township if such improvement is authorized and constructed by any joint board of county commissioners, or by agreement entered into between such joint board and the board of township trustees of one or more townships.
